topic.title: Strep Pneumo Immunization Product - conformance rules

ol.li: 2. SHALL contain [1..1] manufacturedMaterial, which a. SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.6032 PHVS_VaccinesAdministered_StrepPneumo DYNAMIC
Contains exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct, where its type is Manufactured Product
